_description: Copy this file to config.json and customize for your environment
_gemini_url_comment: Base URL for Gemini AI with optional model parameters
_temp_file_path_comment: Path for temporary data files (relative to project root)
_localhost_port_comment: Port for HTTP server (must match Greasemonkey script)
_log_retention_days_comment: How many days to keep log files
_max_prompt_length_comment: Maximum characters in prompt (longer prompts trigger manual input)
